com.github.pascualex.maze

Class MazeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pascualex.maze.MazeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MazeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class defines the logic to enable the main thread to notify requests to the maze and to refresh its view.
    Author:
    Alejandro Pascual

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MazeController(Maze maze, MazeView mazeView)
      Instantiates a maze controller given a maze and a maze view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean clear()
      Sets the solve flag and the pause flag to true if the first one isn't already true.
      void finish()
      Sets the finish flag to true.
      void restart()
      Sets the restart flag to true.
      void run()
      Runs a loop that acts based on the flags and the state of the maze.
      void setStepDelay(int stepDelay)
      Sets the step delay of the maze controller.
      void setTileSide(int tileSide)
      Sets the tile side of the maze.
      boolean solve()
      Sets the solve flag to true if it isn't already true and only if the maze is finished.
